title: Chocolate cupcakes with Nutella® buttercream icing
ingredients: ['For the cupcakes', '60g good quality (70%) cocoa powder', '4 or 5 tablespoons boiling hot water', '175g unsalted butter, softened', '175g caster sugar', '120g self-raising flour', '1 level teaspoon baking powder', '3 eggs', 'For the Nutella® icing', '120g butter, softened', '120g icing sugar', '200g Nutella®', '2 or 3 tablespoons double cream', 'Chopped hazelnuts, for decorating', 'Chocolate sprinkles, for decorating']
